#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int t,br,len,p;
string s,niz[10005],ss;
int main () {
    scanf("%d", &t);
    for (int x=1;x<=t;x++){
    cin>>s;
    len=s.size();
    p=0;
    br=0;
      for (int L=0;L<len;L++)
      for (int R=0;R<len;R++){
        ss=s.substr(L,R-L+1);
        niz[++p]=ss;
    }
       for(int y=1;y<=p;y++)
       sort(niz+1,niz+1+p);
      for (int d=1;d<=p;d++)
      if(niz[d]!=niz[d-1])br++;

    printf("%d\n", br);
    }

 return 0;
}
